alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Western Clinton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Clinton County through 730 PM EDT... At 630 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dannemora, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rain, winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Beekmantown, Chazy, Mooers, Altona, Ellenburg Depot, Champlain, Jericho, Dannemora, West Chazy, Irona, Sciota, Chazy Lake, West Beekmantown, Mooers Forks, Cannon Corners, Dunn Bay, Trombley Bay, Perry Mills, Monty Bay, and Minnetoska Point. This includes Interstate 87 between mile markers 160 and 176. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
